title: Sebi fines Adroit Finance, Silver Stream Equities - Economic Times
content: Sebi fines Adroit Finance, Silver Stream Equities  Economic Times
description: According to the Sebi order, Adroit logged into the backup server of NSE in the currency derivatives segment for 320 trading days during the investigation period. In the case of Silver Stream, Sebi noted that the brokerage logged into the secondary server of NSE in futures and options segment for 201 trading days during the period.
